list-item.p: required nearly full assistance in their daily lives or were incapable of walking and standing,
taking azathioprine, mercaptopurine hydrate, vidarabine, or didanosine,

serum creatinine exceeded 1.5 times the upper limit of the reference value or patients whose AST (GOT) or ALT (GPT) exceeded 2 times the upper limit of the reference value in the test before the registration,
history or present illness of gout, hyperuricemia, or urolithiasis,
past or current treatment with febuxostat,
history of hypersensitivity/idiosyncrasy (allergy) to any drug or drugs (not limited to the study drugs),
used an investigational drug within 30 days of signing the consent form,
pregnant, possibility of pregnancy or lactating, or
judged inappropriate for other reasons by the investigator or sub-investigator.
